website_summaries.verdict: A great mud flap option for people looking for a complete front and rear set of flaps.
pros: The smaller mud flaps fit into most normal car and sedan wheel wells
Heavy duty rubber resists flexing and breaking in bad weather with cold, subzero temperatures
cons: Poor fit and coverage with larger vehicles such as trucks and full-size SUVs

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing predrilled on these
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight and thickness of these flaps. They seem to be of quality material and well made. I took them to a mechanic to have them installed. He said that nothing is predrilled, so it would be quite a task and expensive by the hour to install them. If you're not handy and planning on installing them yourself, I'd find a different brand. If you are handy, "Kudos" to you and I'd recommend that you purchase these.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Qaulity  with great service
customer_reviews.text: I looked around the web and local auto parts stores and found nothing in my price range and I have to say I was a little skeptical on these being there were no reviews and being at a great price. I'm glad I took the chance. These are very sturdy and have the mounting kits included. I have not done any business with this company before so was skeptical. Wow I ordered these on the 4th which they were closed and still got these on the 8th. I'm on the west coast, incredible service and great quality and price. I will return. Thanks my restoration is now complete on my 73 k20 Chevy truck.
customer_reviews.author: VLHallTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: RED hOUND mUD gUARDS
customer_reviews.text: i purchased the guards for my 2018 Acura RLX Hybrid. My previous guards were thin and I cracked one when I backed into a curb. My new Red Hound guards are twice as thick and are less likely to crack when I bump that curb again and they look real good on the car. I recommend them highly. Thank you. Jim
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie H. Griffea

customer_reviews.title: Red Hound premium flares
customer_reviews.text: Though item description says they are universal, yet they don’t fit 2018 Toyota RAV4. More, I thought they come with little flexibility Yet they are so hard . Not rubber to avoid getting destroyed by speed bumps .More over , they charge me $5 when i do return . Amazon return should be free .
customer_reviews.author: Zuhair D.

customer_reviews.title: Decent mud flaps, hardware CANNOT be used
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall look and design of the mud flaps, but the hardware that is provided is pointless and can't be used, all the screws are too small in diameter, so there is the issue of finding the right hardware to install this. Also, the description of the flaps are listed as "Heavy Duty: No flimsy plastic here; our guards are thick, heavy duty polymer". The flaps are DEFINITELY a plastic. I am most likely going to end up returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Foo

customer_reviews.title: Generic
customer_reviews.text: While the mud flaps are now getting the job done, it took my mechanic awhile to get creative to make them work on my 2007 Hyundia Entourage minivan. The front mud flaps were the biggest problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Smalley

customer_reviews.title: Better for cars not trucks
customer_reviews.text: Heavy Duty Plastic indeed. However these universals do not fit the LD/HD Trucks. With a custom fit, you would be lucky to get one bolt to attach to contour of fender. Best if you ordered these with Amazon Prime so you could return them free for 30 days. This seller requires you to pay return shipping and will not reimburse you.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Great mud flaps for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment, easy to install, durable, and they look nice on my truck
customer_reviews.author: cherrycity

customer_reviews.title: Jeep xj
customer_reviews.text: Included screws are rusting w/no salt. Quality seems quite good.
customer_reviews.author: xljetplane

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It all came only made for left side so I threw them away I didn’t unbox it because I was busy so past my return date ... and left side still wasn’t the size it was... in picture.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Some trimming involved for flap installs. Not even difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: Some trimming involved for flap installs. Not even difficult & price helps.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Post

customer_reviews.title: Nice hefty product
customer_reviews.text: I had to make alterations to make it fit, but it now looks OEM.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson T. Minon

customer_reviews.title: ... Chrome on the bottom of them and they are better than factory ones
customer_reviews.text: I placed Chrome on the bottom of them and they are better than factory ones .Great price and great product..
customer_reviews.author: mikejohnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Easy to install. Looks good on the Truck.
customer_reviews.author: MED

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, little work required
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. Good quality, durable material. Instructions included to help with installation. That being said, a power drill and drill bit helps a lot. Overall good buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bo Benton

customer_reviews.title: Ahead of the truck
customer_reviews.text: Mud flaps looks like they will work just fine. Looks strong and sturdy. I ordered my toyota tacoma wont be in until October, i ordered mud flaps ahead of time, like my weather tec floor mats, and seat covers all on order.
customer_reviews.author: Hershel G

customer_reviews.title: Mud guards
customer_reviews.text: These mud guards work great. I put them on my 84 f150. They fit well and are well made. I was given this product for free by manufacturer for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Ardad

customer_reviews.title: We like the look
customer_reviews.text: We put these on our 08 f-150. We like the look, easy to install and bonus that it makes the truck look better. Seems decently made. We've were given this item for free for a honest review.
customer_reviews.author: David Parsch

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on a Chevy 2003 Silverado and they were easy ...
customer_reviews.text: These are much thicker and stronger than I thought they would be. Worked great on a Chevy 2003 Silverado and they were easy to install. Disclaimer: I received this product for free in exchange for my fair and honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

product_meta.title: Red Hound Auto Premium Heavy Duty Molded Universal Mud Flaps Guards Splash Front and Rear Set 4pc
feature_bullets: 4-Piece Deluxe Universal (Front or Rear) Mud Flap Set
Universal Fit: The product has been designed to fit many vehicles and last a lifetime while doing it! (flaps measure approximately 9.75" x 15.75"
Installation Instructions and Mounting hardware included
Heavy Duty: No flimsy plastic here; our guards are thick, heavy duty polymer to stand up to whatever the road gives them
Quality Tested: our mud guards were put through the wringer; Our high tech factory put the mud guards under many hours of testing to ensure they are the highest quality and will last a lifetime
